name: Bloodborne: The Death of Sleep
summary:
Bloodborne: The Death of Sleep is a Bloodborne tie-in comic series from Titan Comics, written by Ales Kot. Its first issue was released in February, 2018. Its plot "focuses on a nameless hunter battling dark creatures in the cursed city of Yharnam.

loodborne: The Death of Sleep will be written by Ales Kot (Generation Gone, Zero, Secret Avengers), who says he’s “obsessed” with the PlayStation 4 game. Artist Piotr Kowalski, who has illustrated the Wolfenstein and Dark Souls books for Titan, will contribute art for Bloodborne: The Death of Sleep. A peek at Kowalski’s art can be seen in the cover to the series’ first issue below.

"Bloodborne is one of my all-time favorite games,” Kot said in a press release. “I put close to two hundred hours into playing it and researching its universe, and that was before I even knew there would be a comic — I was obsessed. I am honored to be working within the Bloodborne universe ...”
